website_summaries.verdict: Massive storage in a well-balanced backpack.
pros: Great everyday backpack with balanced weight distribution
Made from oxford polyester and dobby polyester fabric
cons: Water bottle pocket is limited in size

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement to an older Ogio backpack that actually ripped but it had done its time well. There is so much storage in it, it's awesome. The black color is not the same as pictured and they redesigned it a bit. I decided to upload photos so you guys can see the newer version since it has not been updated in the photos. Hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack but pictures do not match bag received!
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is well designed and has lots of storage space. The size is excellent and not issues with quality. However, please note that what you receive from Amazon is not the same as what is shown in the photos. Either the photo is a new model or an older model. The bag received does NOT have side compression straps and the top handle does not have a hard plastic reinforcement. The handle has a canvas like wrap that is not the same as pictured. I purchased this bag specifically for the compression straps but since it did not come with these straps, it is going back to Amazon. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my circumstantial bag collection (just kidding I ...
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to my circumstantial bag collection (just kidding I only have a few) But yea its super convenient and has an amazing semi cushioned laptop pocket that provides more than enough protection for your laptop! Mine is the surface book 2 15'' inch and its been kept safe and in perfect condition despite my filling this bag to the brim with gym equipment! Although I don't suggest doing that because your gym gear might be different from mine. Nevertheless this thing is sturdy, has many pockets and looks sleek to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Manuel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great back pack. Got it for my husband as a gift and he loves it. A little too pricey for a back pack but it’s nice
customer_reviews.author: MJ Star

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a backpack to carry my laptop and business items with me when I visited a client. I am amazed at the high quality of this item. If you go looking for a good backpack, look for this product. You will have made the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack. I learned years ago that the cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. I learned years ago that the cheap backpacks just don't last for kids once they reach Middle School. I was buying a new one each grading period. I bought this for my grandson for Christmas. Still looks new. The construction is great. It has to be to withstand all the weight he carries around in it. We even pack his lunch in one of the pouches with a small ice pack and the padding keeps it cold. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: DARLINE PISHNERY

customer_reviews.title: Great bag overall
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the money. Only flaw is the bag pictured is NOT the same as I received. Yes the bag I received has a sunglass pocket and about the same pockets total and same features, but the straps are slightly different and the bag doesn’t look the same with the side pockets. The bottom of the straps in the picture have straps that can be used with a universal chest strap(one reason I bought it) and the received product doesn’t have the straps in the lower section that accept the chest strap. Otherwise overall great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Croy’s

customer_reviews.title: compartments small
customer_reviews.text: for a computer, book type bag 5 stars. For workmanship 5 stars. For looks, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Frozenrunner

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Back Pack
customer_reviews.text: Had an OGIO before and was amazed it held up for three years. The new one is a little smaller but works for me at holding my necessary work items. Overall satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Love my Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag it's slightly different then the advertisement so I gave it a 4 star, if not for that I would have gave it a 5 star. It's well put together.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, lots of zippers and pockets
customer_reviews.text: Very nice backpack, well-made, durable, with lots of pockets and zippers to satisfy a high school kid. This should last for a couple of years at least.
customer_reviews.author: Observer666

customer_reviews.title: Got it as a gift for my husband to replaced ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my husband to replaced another Ogio that he had worn out after many years of business travel. He likes this new pack very much. No complaints at all!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hott

customer_reviews.title: OGIO never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier with this pack. It’s durable and has a place for everything I ever need to carry to work.
customer_reviews.author: CLWalk

customer_reviews.title: The best backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has so many compartments I haven't even found all of the yet.
customer_reviews.author: tiggermom

customer_reviews.title: great quality backpack
customer_reviews.text: great quality backpack , lots of secret pockets , will fit a 15-17 mm laptop , lots of cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: faviola betty

customer_reviews.title: Picture is different
customer_reviews.text: Just received this BP today. First thing I noticed was the straps on both sides that are in the picture on Amazon are not included in the product that was shipped. Not really a deal breaker for me but yet but time will tell during airport scans. I have not used it yet but seems very comfortable. Plenty of cushion in the pockets that are going to hold computer and tablets. Tons of places to store more items than I will use while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: SEC

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a good bag to carry my tools and tech while staying ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good bag to carry my tools and tech while staying professional looking. I work in IT and I approve of this bag so far. Time will tell about how it holds up. UPDATE: 2 weeks and the PLASTIC clasp that adjusts the length of the shoulder strap snapped in half when I put it on my shoulder. I didn't notice how thin and cheap it was til it broke.
customer_reviews.author: bkwashpa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for carry on, Tons of room for my cloths Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tony Montana

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the size and style
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the size and style. Seems like it is going to get dirty easy but the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Mtunender

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t properly protect laptop
customer_reviews.text: Not much protection for a laptop. Hardly any padding on the sides which cause only the fabric to be the protector (which is none). Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deff Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Happy about such purchase! Strong and capable is the best backpack I have ever bought. I recommend it to everyone who needs to travel around with his big laptop. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Joker

customer_reviews.title: Great back pack
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect back pack. First rate quality and all the right pockets and zips in the right places. I think this will be my travel/carry on bag of choice for a long time
customer_reviews.author: MR RICHARD EVANS

customer_reviews.title: Buy NOW - you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag - great construction, padding in straps and back of bag, TSA friendly laptop case (opens flat for scanning), tons of zippers & pockets. Really glad I found this and at such a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nina P.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great backpack, however my son has used it four ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack, however my son has used it four six months and one of the straps is almost completely off. It has ripped at the seam. I have contacted customer service about a repair but it's been over a week and no one has returned my email. Sadly I will try again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. It had way more room then it looks like in the picture. It seems well built and is very convenient when commuting on the subway
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: REALLY COOL. RED IS THE BEST CHOICE AND LOOKS TWICE ...
customer_reviews.text: REALLY COOL. RED IS THE BEST CHOICE AND LOOKS TWICE AS GOOD IN PERSON. WELL PADDED BACK PREVENTS SHARP CORNERS FRYOM JABBING YOU IN THE BACK.
customer_reviews.author: James Bond

customer_reviews.title: Item received does not match photo. There are no ...
customer_reviews.text: Item received does not match photo. There are no straps on the sides there is an extra pocket for sunglasses and the logo is missing from the front. I read other reviews that stated the same but figured I'd take my chances, I lost out because I didn't get what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like all the Organization
customer_reviews.text: Its done a great job for me so far. Tons of pockets really help organize well. It is not the slimmest back pack, but feels easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: smart_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great to wear
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for college. Outstanding backpack for the price! Looks and feels great to wear. I am sure that it will last a very long time. I would definitely recommend this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain for a great bag with seemingly limitless room for stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag at a great price. I like the color - it stands out a bit. Very secure. I only carry a 13" MacBook Pro Retina, although the laptop section can hold up to a 17" laptop. That said, it isn't overly thick, so the laptop stays secure even though there's so much extra room. In this bag, I keep a laptop, a small USB keyboard, a small USB mouse, wire clippers, several hundred cable ties, a portable drill in a small carrying case (with charger and spare battery), my laptop charger, a small Ethernet switch, several CAT-5 cables, a USB to serial device, headphones, and to be honest, I have tons of room left over. Comfortable straps too!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to fit my Dell M6700 laptop
customer_reviews.text: I carry a BIG 17 inch laptop which won't fit in my old OGIO backpacks. This has room to spare. The ppocket setup is not as good as some of the other OGIOs I have had (mind you, it is still pretty good) - that is the reason for only 4 stars. But if you need a backpack for a big laptop, this one fits the bill
customer_reviews.author: Greybeard geezer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Durability
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months now and is great so far. Very durable and easy through TSA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised and shown on the picture. Fast delivery. Good Deal.
customer_reviews.author: wws2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has so many compartments. I won't need another bag for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: tone808

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Roomy, tough, and versatile. Straps are comfortable. Can't ask for much more
customer_reviews.author: J. Glove

customer_reviews.title: Bought one of these for my son. He uses ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for my son. He uses it for school and loves it. Says there is more room in it than any other backpack we have ever bought him.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walworth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent backpack! Very versatile, cost effective and has sooooo many compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack however I wish the interior construction was of higher quality. Backpack definitely has a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: A great buy.
customer_reviews.text: A great buy...my son had requested this one as a lot of his friends use the same brand. Large, durable, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable hands-free traveling
customer_reviews.text: I'm a middle-aged woman who still does a lot of traveling with a LARGE laptop. I had been using a OGIO laptop bag for years and loved the quality and how light it was as my computer and power brick weigh a ton! But the computer bag was useless as a carry on and awkward to tote with a suitcase and carry on or purse. This backpack is light and my computer, power supply, files and overnight toiletries, wallet, and spare clothes all fit in the backpack comfortably. I wore it for over an hour on BART while standing and had my hands free to hold my suitcase handle and the bar or strap on the train.
customer_reviews.author: Selane

customer_reviews.title: perfect bag any
customer_reviews.text: fits my HP Pavilion 17 notebook with no problem. perfect bag any trip
customer_reviews.author: cap10

customer_reviews.title: This bag was way better then we thought it would be my daughter loves ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag was way better then we thought it would be my daughter loves it for college. the bag is huge fits everything
customer_reviews.author: lanca e smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Right size, right weight, right amount of pockets. What else could I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Greg Tankersley

customer_reviews.title: New bag for me to lose things haha
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new backpack since my old one was falling apart and had all kinds of hole. This backpack way surpasses the one I had. My last one had only 2-3 pockets, this new one is like overkill with all the pockets. I didn't realize how much I was missing out with all these pockets. I actually lose stuff now because I can't find things in the backpack. My only issue is that I wish the straps for the length were just a little bit longer, but overall I definitely recommend the backpack
customer_reviews.author: Hieu Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: durable and comfortable. Love it no
customer_reviews.text: My large laptop fits perfectly. Lots of room . durable and comfortable. Love it no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice back pack so far
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it a few weeks but it's very spacious and holds everything that I need. The only true test left is to see how durable it is after a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Alex W.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of storage.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a month so far, and love it. I had a Thule backpack before which was good but had no where the amount of storage that this backpack has.
customer_reviews.author: Rion Marshall

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: My first Ogio backpack and so far seems we'll built and has a ton of storage. My wife says that I have a weird obsession with backpacks cause I have quite a collection. I have a Backpack for every occasion, Riding a motorcycle, overnight trips, and everyday use. This Ogio will be my everyday bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my long distance commutes or even my simple day trips
customer_reviews.author: Steven B Olson

customer_reviews.title: I received a counterfeit bag straight from Amazon !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product straight from amazon and not via a third party seller. 1) Side compression straps are missing. 2) Top handle wraparound molded plastic piece is missing. 3) Admin pocket's compartments are stitched without any alignment i.e the pockets are slant. 4) Front chain do not have the Ogio Logo. 5) There's some kind of a patch used to cross stitch the tablet loop strap. 6) Most of the stitching is of inferior quality. 7) All the labels stitched on the bag are slant and not straight.
customer_reviews.author: OwlSyndicate

customer_reviews.title: So far this bag has met my needs and is holding up really good so far
customer_reviews.text: I work in the oilfield and need a bag that wasn't to big but not to small. So far this bag has met my needs and is holding up really good so far. I would recommend this bag
customer_reviews.author: Mark Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Zippers Fall Off
customer_reviews.text: I have to disagree with other reviews that gave this backpack a high rating. Two of the zipper tabs came off a couple months after I bought it. I was able to have one replaced although the red and black cloth pull on the tab will not stay on. The other tab was lost when it fell off so I have to grab the small piece of metal the tab attached to to open that pocket. That may not sound like a big problem until you realize how often you get into the pockets of a backpack. I recommend you find another brand that is higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Taillard

customer_reviews.title: Oh my Ogio!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking pack. Fits 16.4 inch laptop perfectly. Love the look and function.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag. Well-designed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag. Well-designed. Strong construction. Lots of space. Right price. I've owned all the name brands. They're all well made. They're all more expensive. None of them have better design or more space. I'll use this bag until it wears out, gets too dirty or until Ogio designs an even better bag. Then, I'll buy another Ogio. So far, I think it's the best bag I've ever owned and, without question, the best value for the money. Congratulations to Ogio!
customer_reviews.author: David Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, fits all my college books and laptop no problem
customer_reviews.author: Ivan J

customer_reviews.title: Received and in use, pretty good so far will be posting updated review in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I will be posting another review at the 6th months mark but as of now it is as advertised and seems solid. This is a daily use bag so I will let you know down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer44

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice pack, update the zippers failed 2 weeks in , stay away go with mountain hardener or north face.
customer_reviews.author: S. K

customer_reviews.title: Too Many Sections and Dividers
customer_reviews.text: I don't love it. Despite being really big and really heavy, this backpack doesn't have all that much storage room. I think that's because it just has too many dividers and pockets. I just wanted something to hold my laptop and also function as a gym bag; this works but barely.
customer_reviews.author: JJJ1985

customer_reviews.title: I bought my first OGIO bag 12 years ago and it was the best bag I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: zippers are cheap plastic and one of them broke almost immediately. I bought my first OGIO bag 12 years ago and it was the best bag I have ever owned...nothing could damage it. This bag is ok, but not as sturdy as what I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied all of my expectations. Would recommend to a friend. Use it for frequent business travel. Past Ogio customer. Ogio didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Codb31

customer_reviews.title: Pulling fabric after 3 months of moderate use
customer_reviews.text: I had the backpack for about 3 months now, and have used it pretty much just as a computer bag back and forth to work and it already is pulling by the 2nd to top zipper directly above the OGIO logo.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Ursini

customer_reviews.title: The product is good..
customer_reviews.text: The product is good ... But i am not happy with the cost because when the time of booking the cost is around 73$ but after that in an minute it has reduced up to 57$...... I cant understand the scenario behind these.....
customer_reviews.author: Prabhakaran

customer_reviews.title: For what I paid - so sad to see wear before it was very old
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid - so sad to see wear before it was very old. Lots and lots of pockets which is awesome. This bag is huge.
customer_reviews.author: PNW reader

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a larger bag. Well made bag with a lot of storage pockets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: OGIO International Urban Laptop Backpack
product_meta.description: With protective pockets for all of your delicate electronic devices, this backpack is perfect for school, work, or travel. The OGIO Urban 17 backpack is made from oxford polyester and dobby polyester fabric and features a well organized design with integrated foam panels for added protection and fully adjustable ergonomic shoulder straps that make it comfortable to carry. This backpack includes a dedicated laptop compartment, a padded pocket in the main compartment to hold your iPad or tablet, accessory pockets to hold cords and cables and organizer pockets to hold all of your small items and personal accessories. Other features of this pack include side water bottle pockets and a padded back panel for added comfort.
feature_bullets: Pockets: 8 interior slip, 3 interior zip, 7 exterior
